name: conform
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to behave according to the usual standards of behaviour that are expected by a group or society
trans_examp.trans_cn: 顺从；遵从；随大流，顺应习俗

example.eg: At our school, you were required to conform, and there was no place for originality.
example.egtrans: 我们学校要求每个人循规蹈矩，容不得创新求变。
